mapper.select: select mno,mimg, replace(mname,#{searchValue},'${searchValue}')mname from movieup where mname like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' or mdirec like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' or mstory like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' or mactor like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'

select commno,mno, mgood, replace(comm,#{searchValue},'${searchValue}')comm, commdate from ( select rownum rn,commno, mno,mgood,comm,commdate from moviecomm order by COMMDATE desc, rn DESC) where comm like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'

select no, replace(subject,#{searchValue},'${searchValue}')subject, mdate from ( select rownum rn, no, subject, content, mdate from qaboard order by mdate desc, no desc ) where subject like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' or content like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
select mname from (select rownum rn, mname from movieup sample(20)) where rn=1

select 'mcnt' as class, count(mname) cnt from movieup where mname like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' or mstory like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' or mactor like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' or mdirec like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' union all
select 'ccnt',count(comm) from moviecomm where comm like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' union all
select 'qcnt', count(subject) from qaboard where subject like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' or content like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'

select mno,mimg,mtype, SUBSTR(mstartday,0,4) mstartday, replace(mname,#{searchValue},'${searchValue}')mname from ( select rownum rn,a.mno,a.mimg,a.mtype, a.mstartday, a.mname from ( select rownum rn,mno,mimg,mtype,mstartday,mname from movieup where mname like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' or mdirec like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' or mstory like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' or mactor like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' order by rn desc)a ) where rn between #{begin} and #{end}

select commno, mno, mgood, replace(comm,#{searchValue},'${searchValue}')comm, commdate from ( select rownum rn,commno, mno,mgood,comm,commdate from(select rownum rn,commno, mno,mgood,comm,commdate from moviecomm where comm like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' order by commdate desc, rn desc) a ) where rn between #{begin} and #{end}
